Question
========

A person achieves a score of 8.4 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 10.7 with a standard deviation 2.6. The z-score of the person with 8.4 good is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -1.28
* -0.88
* 0.41

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-1.28: Incorrect
-0.88: Correct
* 0.41: Incorrect
